title: When do we get "Runes Reforged"
body:
I was thinking we will get the new Runes in 7.20 update. Because they were out on PBE since 27th September I was hoping to get them NOW, but it looks like they are not out yet.

Can someone tell me WHEN do we get them?
Thanks :p

replies.body: Patch 7.22 is the preseason patch & the new rune system will come with them. The only reason they're were up so early is so Riot can get a decent amount of PBE testing & feedback on the system & the changes that correspond with them.
Not before Nov 7th. Possibly a bit later.
